text: Ahmed Abdou (born 1936) is a Comorian politician. He was the Prime Minister of the Comoros from 27 December 1996 to 9 September 1997. He was Minister of Finance briefly during 1972, and again from 1973 until the country became independent in 1975. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of the Comoros
title: Ahmed Abdou
